languages.text: "Дурные знаки. Пришли темные времена, корабли из {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} почти перестали появляться в Просторе Коронус. В теневых кварталах Футфола процветает скверна, и здешние жители достаточно испорчены, чтобы с радостью отдаваться ей".

traits.locale_text: "Дурные знаки. Пришли темные времена, корабли из Империума почти перестали появляться в Просторе Коронус. В трущобах Футфола процветает скверна, и здешние жители достаточно испорчены, чтобы с радостью отдаваться ей".

languages.text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."
languages.original_text: "Дурные знаки. Пришли темные времена, корабли из {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} почти перестали появляться в Просторе Коронус. В теневых кварталах Футфола процветает скверна, и здешние жители достаточно испорчены, чтобы с радостью отдаваться ей".

traits.locale_text: "Bad signs. Dark times have come, ships from the Imperium barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In the Footfall slums, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to give in to it gladly."

"Bad signs. Dark times have come, ships from the Imperium barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In the Footfall slums, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to give in to it gladly."

"Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the Imperium barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

"Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the Imperium barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

"Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

languages.text: “糟糕的预兆。黑暗的时代已经到来，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的船几乎不再出现在科罗努斯扩区。邪恶在落脚港的阴影区滋生，而这里的人已经被腐化，甚至会欣然服从于邪恶。”
languages.original_text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

traits.locale_text: “糟糕的预兆。黑暗的时代已经到来，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的船几乎不再出现在科罗努斯扩区。邪恶在落脚港的阴影区滋生，而这里的人已经被腐化，甚至会欣然服从于邪恶。”

languages.text: «Malos presagios. Han llegado tiempos oscuros. En la Extensión de Koronus apenas aparecen ya naves del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. En los barrios bajos de Paso la corrupción prospera, y la gente de aquí es tan degenerada que se rendiría ante ella de buena gana».
languages.original_text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

traits.locale_text: «Malos presagios. Han llegado tiempos oscuros. En la Extensión de Koronus apenas aparecen ya naves del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. En los barrios bajos de Paso la corrupción prospera, y la gente de aquí es tan degenerada que se rendiría ante ella de buena gana».

languages.text: 「凶兆です。暗黒時代が到来しました。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の船がコロヌス・エクスパンスに姿を見せることもほとんどありません。フットフォールのシャドウクォーターでは穢れが跋扈し、ここの民は喜んでそれに屈するほど堕落しています」
languages.original_text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

traits.locale_text: 「凶兆です。暗黒時代が到来しました。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の船がコロヌス・エクスパンスに姿を見せることもほとんどありません。フットフォールのシャドウクォーターでは穢れが跋扈し、ここの民は喜んでそれに屈するほど堕落しています」
「凶兆です。暗黒時代が到来しました。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の船がコロヌス・エクスパンスに姿を見せることもほとんどありません。フットフォールのシャドウクォーターでは穢れが跋扈し、ここの民は喜んでそれに屈するほど堕落しています」

languages.text: "Böse Omen. Wir leben in dunklen Zeiten – es erscheinen kaum noch Schiffe des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. In den Schattenquartieren von Footfall gedeiht der Makel, und die Menschen hier sind korrupt genug, um ihm gerne zu erliegen."
languages.original_text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

traits.locale_text: "Böse Omen. Wir leben in dunklen Zeiten – es erscheinen kaum noch Schiffe des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. In den Schattenquartieren von Footfall gedeiht der Makel, und die Menschen hier sind korrupt genug, um ihm gerne zu erliegen."

languages.text: « De mauvais présages. Nous vivons des heures sombres . C'est à peine si l'on croise encore des vaisseaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} dans les Étendues de Koronus. Dans le Quartier des Ombres de Castel, la corruption s'étend, et les gens y sont déjà suffisamment dépravés pour succomber de bon cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

traits.locale_text: « De mauvais présages. Nous vivons des heures sombres . C'est à peine si l'on croise encore des vaisseaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} dans les Étendues de Koronus. Dans le Quartier des Ombres de Castel, la corruption s'étend, et les gens y sont déjà suffisamment dépravés pour succomber de bon cœur. »

languages.text: "Kötü alametler. Karanlık zamanlar geldi çattı, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} gemileri artık Koronus Enginliği'nde nadiren görünür oldu. Binliman'ın Gölge Mahalli'nde pislik serpilip yayılıyor ve buradaki insanlar o denli yozlaşmış ki ona hevesle kucak açıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Bad omens. Dark times have come — ships from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} barely appear in the Koronus Expanse anymore. In Footfall's Shadow Quarters, taint thrives, and the people here are corrupt enough to succumb to it gladly."

traits.locale_text: "Kötü alametler. Karanlık bir zamanda yaşıyoruz, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} gemileri artık Koronus Enginliği'nde nadiren görünür oldu. Binliman'ın Gölge Mahali'nde kirlenmişlik hüküm sürüyor ve buradaki insanlar o kadar yozlaşmış durumda ki kirlenmeye mutlulukla kucak açıyorlar."
